ComicInfo.Title: The Gray Man, Part 4 of 4: Closure
ComicInfo.Summary:
The final showdown between the Gray Man and Lucifer over the fate of mankind and the otherworldly conflict that could consume us all! What horrible price has the Sheriff paid to tip the balance in our favor? Will it be enough to save humanity? The answers are here - but the ongoing adventures of the FALL OF CTHULHU cast will continue next month in FALL OF CTHULHU: GODWAR!
Bonus: Text stories from Fall of Cthulhu fiction contest winners, the Roncoli Brothers!
